text: was a Japanese politician. He was the 76th and 77th Prime Minister of Japan from 1989 to 1991. Kaifu died on 9 January 2022, a week after his 91st birthday at a Tokyo hospital from pneumonia.FORMER PM KAIFU DIES AT 91 Norio Kaifu and Makoto Kobayashi are his brothers. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1931 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Japan Category:Politicians from Aichi Prefecture Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) politicians Category:Ministers of finance of Japan
title: Toshiki Kaifu
